DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator wish explore potential neuroprotective effect acute oral supplementation lycopene , natural anti-oxidant derived tomato , cerebral vasospasm autoregulation , examine whether improvement translate reduction biochemical marker vascular injury inflammation decrease prevalence secondary stroke follow subarachnoid haemorrhage .
DOC.criteria: Age : > 18 year old , Confirmed aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage ( aSAH ) , Time ictus < 96 hour Age : < 18 year old , Nonaneurysmal SAH , Time ictus > 96 hour , Severe carotid atherosclerotic disease ( â‰¥70 % ) Highdose statin therapy ( > 80 mg/day fluvastatin ; > 40 mg/day simvastatin ; > 40 mg/day pravastatin ; > 10 mg/day atorvastatin ; > 10 mg/day rosuvastatin 28 ) , Allergy hypersensitivity tomato tomato product history significant atopy/allergy ( e.g . soy , whey , lutein , lecithin )
